alert.note: Alert for Barnstable (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 4:27PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Barnstable, Plymouth and east central Bristol Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 427 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Plympton, or near Bridgewater, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Brockton, Plymouth, Taunton, Bridgewater, Marshfield, Middleborough, Wareham, Sandwich, Bourne, Pembroke, Rockland, Abington, Duxbury, Whitman, Hanover, East Bridgewater, Raynham, Kingston, Carver and Lakeville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. For your safety, go indoors or to your vehicle.
